S.FORM: == ciwcangpu, ciwcangpo == 石菖蒲 mauzip i Yacu, hali nanum , manamuh i tabal nu nanum. taneng sapisapayu'. kagak kakuniza sabul :真核域 Eukarya salaedan :植物界 Plantae panan :被子植物門 Magnoliophyta upiz :單子葉植物綱 Liliopsida mata :菖蒲目 Acorales sapamat :菖蒲科 Acoraceae mikitinay :菖蒲屬 Acorus hicahicaay :石菖蒲 A. gramineus u siwkay nu nipaluma u sanek nu nipaluma malaheci tu imelang pasubana i cacudadan a lacul u zuma a cidekay a kamu, saungay misapayu' a cidekay u sulit nu zuma a kamu-Hulam atu Amilika Acorus gramineus, commonly known as grass-leaf sweet flag, dwarf sedge, Japanese rush, and Japanese sweet flag, is a botanical species belonging to the genus Acorus, native to Japan, Korea in eastern Asia. The plant usually grows in wetlands and shallow water.

== ciwcangpo, ciwcangpo == 石菖蒲 maozip i Yaco, hali nanom , manamoh i tabal no nanom. taneng sapisapayo'. kagak kakoniza sabol :真核域 Eokarya salaedan :植物界 Plantae panan :被子植物門 Magnoliophyta opiz :單子葉植物綱 Liliopsida mata :菖蒲目 Acorales sapamat :菖蒲科 Acoraceae mikitinay :菖蒲屬 Acoros hicahicaay :石菖蒲 A. gramineos o siwkay no nipaloma o sanek no nipaloma malaheci to imelang pasobana i cacodadan a lacol o zoma a cidekay a kamo, saongay misapayo' a cidekay o solit no zoma a kamo-Holam ato Amilika Acoros gramineos, commonly known as grass-leaf sweet flag, dwarf sedge, Japanese rosh, and Japanese sweet flag, is a botanical species belonging to the genos Acoros, native to Japan, Korea in eastern Asia. The plant osoally grows in wetlands and shallow water.
